name: Incitement 3
description: An expansive dystopian sci-fi world awaits you! Equipment customization, a varied cast and an epic story in this sci-fi epic from Astronomic Games.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows XP or above Processor: Intel Pentium 4 2.Ghz or above Graphics: Minimum 640x480 Desktop Resolution Storage: 500 MB available space Sound Card: Stereo Sound

reviews.review_text: Nice Sci-fi RPG, great soundtrack and smooth controls.  Great game to take on holiday when playing on an old laptop.
Much better than I expected by it's title. Very nice RPG game, with a science-fiction twist.  Cards drop rate is super fast.

Received Free from Rezzed 3 Game Mystery Pack. This is a JRPG style game similar to that of Final Fantasy VI. I didn't get very far before I was saying 'nope' and the very first battle had me feeling bored and frustrated after I had used 3 attacks and 3 special moves on a guard and he still wasn't dead... My time is precious, sorry.
